      • convertApriltagtoOpenCV

        public static Transform3d convertApriltagtoOpenCV​(Transform3d pose)
        Apply a 180 degree rotation about X to the rotation component of a given Apriltag pose. This aligns it with the OpenCV poses we use in other places.
